description:
More than twenty years have passed since 28 Days Later was released in 2002. Additionally, nearly two decades have passed since its 2007 sequel 28 Weeks Later. Now fans are finally getting the next follow-up in the series – 28 Years Later, the new trailer for which can be viewed below. The original 28 Days [...]

The post New ’28 Years Later’ Trailer Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: New ’28 Years Later’ Trailer Released

description:
Fans were recently treated to the first teaser for The Fantastic Four: First Steps. The positively-received footage gave us a look at a retro-futuristic world with several familiar comic book heroes. Now the full trailer for the MCU‘s upcoming film The Fantastic Four: First Steps has been released, which happens to include our first look [...]

The post ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Full Trailer Reveals Julia Garner As Silver Surfer appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Full Trailer Reveals Julia Garner As Silver Surfer
